item.title: Free E-Books about Reactive Apps, Streaming, Data Science and Scala
item.description:
As you may know, there are always some free books and articles. You just have to fond them…

Here’s a (of course incomplete) list of free literature I like. Get it, if you’re interested. You may have to register or something:

Reactive Applications & Streaming

  • Designing Reactive Systems: The Role Of Actors In Distributed Architecture - Hugh McKee
  • Fast Data Architectures For Streaming Applications - Dean Wampler
  • Developing Reactive Microservices - Markus Eisele
  • Reactive Microservices Architecture - Jonas Bon√©r

Data Science & Machine Learning

  • An Introduction to Statistical Learning - Gareth James, Daniela Witten, Trevor Hastie and Robert Tibshirani
  • R Programming for Data Science - Roger D. Peng
  • The Elements of Statistical Learning - Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani, Jerome Friedman

Scala

  • Scala By Example - Martin Odersky
  • Scala for the Impatient - Cay Horstmann
  • Programming in Scala, First Edition - Martin Odersky, Lex Spoon, and Bill Venners

If you liked one of those books, make a donation or buy a hardcopy to support the authors ;)
